data.description: Job OverviewAre you passionate about turning data into decisions at scale? Our Enterprise Analytics Internship places you within the Analytics Center of Excellence (CoE) to support data-driven initiatives across finance, operations, customer experience, commercial, HR, and IT. As an intern, you’ll collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, analytics translators, data engineers, and business sponsors to define metrics, build dashboards, and uncover insights that improve enterprise performance. You’ll gain hands-on experience across the full analytics lifecycle—from data wrangling and visualization to storytelling for leaders. Interested? Apply today!What you will be doing:Conduct data analysis to develop insights that enhance business performance across various enterprise functions.Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to track enterprise-wide performance. Business/Data Analytics, Information Systems, Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, or a related fieldPartner to develop dashboards for various business touchpoints.Present analytical findings to key departmental leaders to facilitate decision-making.Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and business stakeholders, to identify reporting needs and optimization opportunities.What you need:Must be an active student in a bachelor’s degree program with an emphasis in Business/Data Analytics, Information Systems, Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, or a related field.18 years of age or older.What we desire:Current, cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher from one of the following universities (University of North Texas, University of Texas at Arlington, University of Texas at Dallas, Paul Quinn College, or University of Oklahoma)We are interested in every qualified candidate who is eligible to work in the United States. However, we are not able to sponsor visas for this position at this time.About UsWe are Dallas Fort Worth International (DFW) Airport-one of the most successful airports in the world by any definition. We are recognized for our innovation, leadership, drive for excellence and talented employees.Our success is made possible because of the diverse talents of over 2,100 employees who champion our mission of providing an exceptional airport experience to our customers and connect our community to the world. We are looking for the best talent to join us and help reimagine what an airport can be.Bring your talents to DFW. Live and work with purpose.
requirements: Must be an active student in a bachelor’s degree program with an emphasis in Business/Data Analytics, Information Systems, Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, or a related field.
responsibilities: Conduct data analysis to develop insights that enhance business performance across various enterprise functions.
Partner to develop dashboards for various business touchpoints.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and business stakeholders, to identify reporting needs and optimization opportunities.
